DOC.detailed_description: Hypovitaminosis D generally define 25 ( OH ) D level < 20ng/ml , level 21-29ng/ml indicate insufficiency 30ng/ml regard sufficient . The rational behind observation associate vitamin D deficiency CVD one hand , hypovitaminosis D find associate traditional risk factor hypertension ( HTN ) , diabetes mellitus ( dm ) , obesity , dyslipidemia metabolic syndrome , hand , experimental data demonstrate vitamin D could affect cardiac muscle cell directly , control parathyroid ( PTH ) hormone secretion , regulate rennin- angiotensin- aldosterone system immune system , could influence cardiovascular risk . Epidemiological study support association , demonstrate high prevalence hypovitaminosis D among U.S. adult cardiovascular disease ( 74 % ) . An association low vitamin D level increase myocardial infarction risk well total mortality also observe . Low 25hydroxyvitamin D [ 25 ( OH ) D ] level also independently associate cause CVD mortality among patient schedule coronary catheterization .
